item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde! Do you love French language and culture? For this meeting, bring a few nice photos, if you have them, of France or the French-speaking world. Topics of past meetups have included travel, religion, politics, and other juicy topics!
Il ya beaucoup de gens who want to practice speaking French. They would like to parler avec vous! Venez for coffee and patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!!
We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month.
Bienvenue!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French August Meetup
